page.title: 06Turnditch Primary School
page.content: Most of the Juniors go swimming every Tuesday at Belper Sports Centre. The Infants go swimming at Wirksworth on Tuesdays. I like playing games on the computer best.In July ,we have our SPORTS DAY. We have these races:- {sprint, egg + spoon, potato, skipping, {sack, obstacle , marathon and relay. My favourite dinner is sausages for the first course and iced buns for the second course. I like this school because it is small.I like the teachers.Julie Little is my best friend. On our school field we have a big hollow log that we can play on. We also have two small logs that we can play on. On Wednesdays, some of the old age pensioners come to school and have dinner with us. Some of them came to this school when theu were small. They think it is much better at school now!
